Name: arlington_2004_civic_poly
Abstract:
The Civic personal geodatabase delineates the areas of Arlington County
    included in civic associations, and identifies each area by name. The
    CIVIC_BUFFER feature class delineates the same areas except as a “buffered”
    line; that is, a band of color (or fill pattern) along the perimeter delineates each
    civic association, rather than showing the entire polygon. Annotation identifies
    the name of each association.
FgdcText:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>

      <citeinfo>
        <origin>GIS Mapping Center</origin>
        <pubdate>2004/03/24</pubdate>
        <title>Civic,  Arlington County, VA</title>
        <geoform>Vector Digital Data Set (Polygon)</geoform>
        <onlink>\\GIS-VISITOR\C$\Documents and Settings\VISITOR\Desktop\Arlington_2004\Civic_poly.shp</onlink>
      <ftname Sync="TRUE">arlington_2004_civic_poly</ftname>
</citeinfo>
    </citation>
    <descript>
      <abstract>
    The Civic personal geodatabase delineates the areas of Arlington County
    included in civic associations, and identifies each area by name. The
    CIVIC_BUFFER feature class delineates the same areas except as a “buffered”
    line; that is, a band of color (or fill pattern) along the perimeter delineates each
    civic association, rather than showing the entire polygon. Annotation identifies
    the name of each association.
   </abstract>
      <purpose>This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.</purpose>
    </descript>
